column2: Chicago-style pizza is a must in the Windy City. While Lou Malnati's Pizzeria delivers the goods
column3: I must admit that I've had better pizza. The pizza is nice and thick
column4: but I would describe it as merely "good" and not "great". If you are looking to get stuffed full of food
column5: a mere two slices will do the trick
column6: although I feel the sauce and sausage could have a bit more flavor.
